roleset.name: to make neutral
roleset.note: NEUTRALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'neutralize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from neutralize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Strategy is not a separate event in an idealized sequence of discrete events ; it is a way of thinking that [*T*-1] neutralizes threats to our interests in a manner consistent with our financial , cultural and physical limitations .
example.arg: in a manner consistent with our financial , cultural and physical limitations

roleset.name: indifferent
roleset.note: NEUTRAL-J NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from neutral.01-j)

example.name: Both args
example.text: Russia is pretty neutral about most international affairs now.
